data.message:
Hello Facebook
My friend exposure to penetrate the Facebook account password was changed and Emile and phone number and the account has been ban
what I do ?!

replies.message: Hi there, Suhaib. You can learn more about possible reasons why accounts get disabled here: http://on.fb.me/1kNUore. If you think that your account was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal. Hope this helps! -Rey
no emil no phone number .what i do ?

Good Morning, Facbook. I have a couple of questions for you, one more important than the other and I'm not sure how to get ahold of you guys. The least important question is why don't have I have the option to share memories? They aren't on my page anywhere... I'd really like to have them.
My most important question: Is is possible to make sure that a family member's Facebook page who has passed away, unable to be accessed by other people? We want to keep the account open, but we want to make sure that it can't be tampered with. I'd appreciate any information that you can give

Hi there, Cassie. We're very sorry for your loss. There is an option to memorialize your family member's account to keep it secure. You can learn more about how to request memorialization here: http://on.fb.me/1RDtAnL. As for your On This Day settings, you can learn more about how to share your memories here: http://on.fb.me/1RDtBbl. Keep in mind that not all memories can be shared. We hope this information was helpful. -Rey

Thank you so much. You were very helpful. I have on more question that pairs with my question about the memorial page. Is there any way at all to stop someone who may be upsetting my family members from posting on the memorial page? Thank you so much.
